title: Sinfully Devoted
description: Will Phoenix Brooks rise from the ashes like her name sake? Phoenix The past has finally caught up to us all. They all think I’m fragile, made of cracked porcelain, about to shatter and break. The thing is, you can’t break what’s already been broken. I’m going to fight this time, no matter the cost, I refuse to let anyone break me again. And with these three overbearing, protective boys at my side, I can do anything. Logan Once her tormentor, now, her biggest ally. I’m going to protect her, win back her heart and get my second chance to be her rock. Even if I am only one of three. I don’t mind sharing her, if it means I get to be hers. I won’t make the mistake of ever doubting her again. From now on, my alliance is to her and only her. The only question is Can she forgive those that wronged her and open her heart again?
author: Amber Torney
